QuestData.Title: Plug the Sinkholes
QuestData.Description: The Scourge are showing no sign of letting up, $n. It's those blasted sinkholes; they connect to tunnels all the way to Icecrown for all we know. Giant undead worms burrow under the ground to create them.$B$BIf there's something years of mining has taught me it's that without support beams, tunnels will cave in easily after an explosion.$B$BTake these explosives and place them at the entrance to the sinkholes up on the ridge beyond the beach to the west. Come back after you've collapsed them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Sergeant Hammerhill wants you to use the Incendiary Explosives to collapse the sinkholes southwest and northwest of Valiance Keep.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you succeed, $n? We need to slow down the Scourge or Valiance Keep will be overrun.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work, $n. Without you, Valiance Keep might've not held against the attackers. Thanks to your help we'll live to fight another day.
